TopicTitle: The ROUND8 memorial thread - UPDATE: It's alive!

Articles.Content: I dont always use such small L-F/O tanks. But when I do I use the Round-8

> 
> I haven't seen this much passion around here since that time they were going to limit all Forum posts to 140 characters.

I swear to God that if it is another April Fools joke... I don't know what I'll do. But hey, if they can do it two weeks early, they can do it two weeks late.

I think it was the only stock tank left in my install... I'll finally be all the way to just 1 procTank part.

(shrugs)

I guess it was only their game-engine I've wanted for a while anyway.

Add my voice to the chorus of those who don't like this tank going away. I actually do use it frequently on small probes and landers and also like it for its asthetics. I hope they reconsider this decision and bring back the Round-8 tank. 

If they want to get rid of parts, how about that stuipd micronode that is completely useless and broken? I don't think I've ever seen a design that uses it.

Watch out, Squad.

[![screenshot3537_zpsbusv6ksm.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3537_zpsbusv6ksm.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot3537_zpsbusv6ksm.png.html)

What would fit better for a memorial thread than a memorial?

![u7cd24S.png](http://i.imgur.com/u7cd24S.png)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115659-The-I?p=1839158&viewfull=1#post1839158](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115659-The-I?p=1839158&viewfull=1#post1839158)

We will fight for you, ROUND-8! We never leave a tank behind!

> 
> If they want to get rid of parts, how about that stuipd micronode that is completely useless and broken? I don't think I've ever seen a design that uses it.

Yes! You could fit loads of xenon in that stupid thing!

Well if you want a part to get rid of, you can get between the [Engine Nacelle](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Engine_Nacelle) and the [Radial Engine Body](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Radial_Engine_Body) , that while originally devised to be diferent function parts, nowadays are the same part for all practical aspects , since they only differ in appearance and funds cost ( same weight, same size, same fuel capacity, same intake area, same intake air, same science node ).

OFC that any of them would make a ugly as hell Xenon tank, but that is not my fault ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I made a signature picture for everyone to show your compassion with the ROUND-8:

![0M4g7WC.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1)

Just copy this in you signature (will then directly link to the poll):

[noparse][![0M4g7WC.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115621-Do-you-think-Squad-should-leave-the-Round8-Toroidal-Tank-alone)[/noparse]

See you in a mod, ROUND-8!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T15:01:36Z" title="04/16/2015 03:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Kerdinand**
  
Spelled "Lifesaver" wrong. Livesaver. IÃ‚Â´m stupid sometimes.
I dont usually hop on the bandwagon but...

> 
> I made a signature picture for everyone to show your compassion with the ROUND-8:
> [http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1)
> 
> Or just copy this in you signature (will then directly link to the poll):
> 
> [noparse]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115621-Do-you-think-Squad-should-leave-the-Round8-Toroidal-Tank-alone'>[http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/0M4g7WC.png?1)[/noparse]
> 
> See you in a mod, ROUND-8!

Everyone! Now is the time! Make a difference. Use this signature. The hope is not dead.
if we let them take female kerbals of the feature list, will they let us keep the round-8?
If squad wants some bigger xenon tanks why don't they just take the one from KSPX? And while they're at it add the probe-size tanks from RLA.

> 
> if we let them take female kerbals of the feature list, will they let us keep the round-8?

Wait, now we want them to take the female kerbals out? When did i miss that??

> 
> Wait, now we want them to take the female kerbals out? When did i miss that??

No, that is not what anybody wants. He was being silly.

Well, he has a point. Female kerbonauts are, from a pure gameplay perspective, more redundant than the Round-8 tank. And before someone starts foaming about me dissing female kerbals, I'm talking about gameplay ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**The** [**Reddit Thread**](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/32q940/squad_is_proposing_to_change_the_round8_tank_into/) has gained a fair bit of support for this too. But will they listen? Are they even paying any attention to the community anymore?

> 
> **The** [**Reddit Thread**](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/32q940/squad_is_proposing_to_change_the_round8_tank_into/) has gained a fair bit of support for this too. But will they listen? Are they even paying any attention to the community anymore?

[You tell me](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108318-Do-you-feel-KSP-is-ready-for-1-0)

What's a Riddet? Is that something like a Twooter?

Anyway, I think we can be quite certain that they are listening. Perhaps frustratingly for us, this is not a dialogue. The fate of the Round 8 will soon be known, in any case.

Happy landings!

> 
> What's a Riddet? Is that something like a Twooter?
> Anyway, I think we can be quite certain that they are listening. Perhaps frustratingly for us, this is not a dialogue. The fate of the Round 8 will soon be known, in any case.
> 
> Happy landings!

I think it's something like that facadebook or something?

Normally, I'm in full support of the "it's their game, they can do what they want" argument, but this is like...the overwhelming majority of the fanbase saying "woah there! cool your jets bro!" and I feel like Squad would benefit more with a compromise.

![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

The Round-8 is one of my favorite parts. Makes my choice easy on the first mod to install when 1.0 drops.

> 
> ![JxUxBHj.png](http://i.imgur.com/JxUxBHj.png)
> 
>

Please refer to instructions in my sig on how to save your precious fuel tank.

To spoiler hide, you take the item that you want to hide:

This is spoiler text

![ABIitX8.png](http://i.imgur.com/ABIitX8.png)

Then use 

> 
>  and 

 tags like this:

[noparse]

> 
> This is spoiler text
> 
> ![ABIitX8.png](http://i.imgur.com/ABIitX8.png)
> 
> 

[/noparse]

Which gives this:

> 
> This is spoiler text
> 
> ![ABIitX8.png](http://i.imgur.com/ABIitX8.png)
> 
> 

Feel free to test it out on my thread:

[The great forum test thread!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113844-The-great-forum-test-thread!)
